channel.title: Issue with runserver.bat
channel.description:
I have a problem with my runserver.bat First my run.bat just opened and closed, i added pause then it said it could find the batch intern extern blabla so i redid my PATHS and compiled (the compiler is working perfect without errors) now it says this:
error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap error: could not create the Java Virtual Machine. error: Fatal exception has occurred program will exit.
I totally lost it now, never saw something like this before, i hope someone can help me thanks in advance Problem fixed: working code: [code]@echo off title RandomScape, sourced by Dallas Nathan Mitchell, coded by RandQm (Version: 1.0) color 0f echo ---------------------------------------------------- echo RandomScape, made by RandQm. echo ---------------------------------------------------- echo System: RandomScape loader is currently using RandomScapeserver1.10 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause [/code]

item.title: Issue with runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

What type of server is it?

Try this path it might work

@echo off Title KozOWns START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 Echo Please wait while the client loads. This may take a while. exit

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I have a problem with my runserver.bat

First my run.bat just opened and closed, i added pause then it said it could find the batch intern extern blabla

so i redid my PATHS and compiled (the compiler is working perfect without errors)

now it says this:

error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap error: could not create the Java Virtual Machine. error: Fatal exception has occurred program will exit.

I totally lost it now, never saw something like this before, i hope someone can help me

thanks in advance

Problem fixed:
working code:

@echo off title RandomScape, sourced by Dallas Nathan Mitchell, coded by RandQm (Version: 1.0) color 0f echo ---------------------------------------------------- echo RandomScape, made by RandQm. echo ---------------------------------------------------- echo System: RandomScape loader is currently using RandomScapeserver1.10 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic
